item.title: Pokemon GO Player Catches Super Rare, But Useless Pokemon
item.description:
Highlights

  • A Pokemon GO player catches an incredibly unusual shiny Pokemon, discovering a rare shiny "nundo" Eevee within the game.
  • The odds of finding a shiny Pokemon with zero stats serves as one of the game's rarest encounters, with in-game conditions like weather typically boosting a creature's stats.
  • Fans in the post's replies calculated the staggering odds of the shiny "nundo" Eevee, with roughly a one-in-2 million chance of finding the unexpected combination.

A Pokemon GO player recently found themselves capturing a highly sought-after shiny Pokemon, only to find out the Pokemon's stats make it basically useless. Alongside the sizable roster of creatures to discover, the massively popular monster-catching mobile game offers a wide variety of unique variants of its many Pokemon. Each Pokemon a player captures can vary in its base stats, with some boasting particular advantages for the game's battles, alongside the Pokemon franchise's traditional "shiny" variants . Now, one player has found a very unusual shiny Pokemon within their game.

Pokemon GO features a simplified version of the franchise's in-game statistics, offering an easy way for players to gauge a Pokemon's viability in battles. Each creature's statistics are broken down into three basic stats with players able to determine a Pokemon's base values for ATK, DEF, and HP. A Pokemon's strengths and weaknesses are calculated into a total "Combat Power," with some of the game's strongest Pokemon boasting CP as high as greater than 4000. However, one player's newly caught shiny finds itself at the opposite end of the power scale.

Related
Pokemon GO Details Rivals Week Event
Pokemon GO is releasing some very exciting and important details for players regarding the game's upcoming limited-time event, Rivals Week.

Reddit user gabri6446 shared their unusually unfortunate find on the Pokemon GO subreddit, showing off their newest shiny Pokemon. The post showcases a newly caught shiny Eevee within Pokemon GO , revealing that the creature boasts zeroes in all of its statistics. The "nundo" serves as one of Pokemon GO 's rarest encounters , with only a 1-in-4096 chance of finding a Pokemon with the shockingly low stat line. Coupled with the low odds of finding a shiny Pokemon, the Eevee boasts the unfortunate status as one of the game's rarest finds.

Pokemon GO Player Finds Super Rare Shiny "Nundo"

Users in the comment shared the player's initial shock, commenting on the absurdity of the situation revolving around the shiny Eevee. One fan shared a rough estimate of the unusual Eevee's rarity, suggesting that the chances of getting a shiny "nundo" in Pokemon GO are roughly 1-in-2 million. Others encouraged the player not to evolve the Eevee, suggesting they should fully level its stats to flaunt the rare situation. Others pointed out that finding a shiny "nundo" comes with even rarer odds than a perfect shiny Pokemon , with in-game conditions like weather able to boost a Pokemon's base stats.

The unusual shiny "nundo" comes as one of Pokemon GO 's rarest encounters in a game filled with elusive Pokemon. The game features multiple of the franchise's "Mythical Pokemon," only able to be obtained during in-game events like the recently-released Diancie Special Research . Pokemon GO also features many region-exclusive creatures as well, with some Pokemon like Corsola and Tropius only available in certain areas of the world. Catching a shiny "nundo" stands as one of Pokemon GO 's most unusual and least glamorous accomplishments.

item.title: Next Fallout Game May Release Sooner than Expected
item.description:
Highlights

  • Reports indicate that Xbox is keen on capitalizing on Fallout's popularity post-Amazon show with expedited development plans for the next entry.
  • Fallout 5's release may still be far off, potentially prompting Xbox to consider outsourcing Fallout development to another studio.
  • Xbox's acquisition of Obsidian opens up the possibility of parallel development for new Fallout and Elder Scrolls titles.

A new report claims Xbox is aware of the hype surrounding the Fallout franchise and is looking to expedite development of its next entry. After the release of the Amazon show, fan interest in the Fallout series has seen a significant boost, with player counts skyrocketing on every platform. Bethesda took advantage of this wave of popularity by releasing Fallout 4 's free next-gen update on April 25.

While Fallout 4 's native next-gen version offers a host of improvements and content additions, it's still a 9-year-old game at its core. Many fans wonder when Fallout 5 may release, and the truth of the matter is that if it were to be developed by Bethesda, then it may take around 10 more years at the very least. After the release of Starfield last year, Bethesda shifted its developmental focus to Elder Scrolls 6 , which was first revealed in 2018 and is still years away from launch. Creative director Todd Howard also confirmed back in 2022 that Fallout 5 is next up after Elder Scrolls 6 . Assuming the latter's development progresses on time, and it releases by 2027-2028, Fallout 5 will take another 6â€“7 years to make. That puts Bethesda and Xbox in a precarious position today, as the series is experiencing a heady dose of popularity, but without a full-fledged new game to enhance it further.

Related
The Case For Fallout 5 To Be a Fresh Start
Fallout 5 is likely still a bit far away, and with such a breadth between mainline release, it may be best for Fallout to hit the reset button.

On a recent episode of the Xbox Two podcast , credible Microsoft insider Jez Corden outlined this exact problem, and said that Xbox is "aware" of the heightened interest in Fallout , as well as the guaranteed success that the next entry in the franchise will be. But with no current way to cash in on the hype with Fallout 5 and Bethesda being too busy with Elder Scrolls 6 , Xbox is apparently considering other means to accelerate development for a new Fallout game.

Xbox May Task Another Studio with the Fallout IP

Outsourcing the IP to another developer is seemingly one of Xbox's best bets, says Corden. This would allow for a new Fallout title to be developed in parallel with Elder Scrolls 6 , potentially even releasing within a year of each other. This isn't something new for Bethesda, of course, as 2010's Fallout New Vegas was developed by Obsidian and went on to become a fan-favorite in the series. And as it happens, Xbox now owns Obsidian as well, enriching the possibility even further.

However, with Obsidian developing Avowed and The Outer Worlds 2 , taking on an IP the size of Fallout may not be feasible for it right now. Moreover, Fallout games have always been huge, ambitious experiences that can take hundreds of hours to fully absorb, so no matter which studio potentially ends up with the IP, it will take several years for the game to hit the market. However, Xbox may just be planning ahead by timing the release of the next Fallout title with the TV series' third season.

item.title: Hunter X Hunter: Nen X Impact Reveals Two More Playable Characters
item.description:
Highlights

  • The new trailer for Hunter X Hunter: Nen X Impact reveals 2 new playable characters: Machi Komacine and Uvogin.
  • Gameplay confirmed as 2D 3v3 team fighter, similar to Marvel vs. Capcom and Dragon Ball FighterZ, with tag-team mechanics.
  • Platforms confirmed for release include PS5, PC via Steam, and Nintendo Switch, with players able to try it at EVO Japan 2024.

Bushiroad Game and Eighting have released a brand-new trailer for Hunter X Hunter: Nen X Impact , confirming two more playable characters for its roster: Machi Komacine and Uvogin. This licensed fighting game was first announced last December, with a reveal trailer for Nen X Impact released at the start of 2024. The reveal trailer gave a brief look at the game's roster, confirming six playable characters off the bat, along with a sleek anime art style.

The reveal trailer for Hunter X Hunter: Nen X Impact didn't give much information about its gameplay, other than confirming it was a 3v3 tag-team fighting game. This left fans a bit confused about what type of game it was, wondering if it would be a 3D arena fighter or a 2D fighting game. Many have noted the perspective and Eighting's past works, like DNF Duel and Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3, would likely see Nen X Impact being the latter. With EVO Japan 2024 now underway, Bushiroad and Eighting have revealed more about the game, including part of its roster and gameplay.

Related
15 Best Anime Fighting Games Of All Time
Plenty of anime games have come out over the years. But these amazing titles each did something to set them apart from the rest.

The new trailer confirms that Hunter X Hunter: Nen X Impact is a 2D 3v3 team fighter, similar to the Marvel vs. Capcom series and Dragon Ball FighterZ . Players can call upon their teammates to assist them in battle, either to disrupt an opponent's offense or to extend their combos. The trailer also shows brief pre-match introductions between the leading members of each team, such as showing Kurapika interacting with Uvogin.

The trailer also confirmed Uvogin and Machi Komacine for Hunter X Hunter: Nen X Impact 's launch roster , though in very brief moments, with Uvogin acting as a sandbag for Kurapika and his team to demonstrate their moves on. Uvogin is a major antagonist of Hunter X Hunter , one of the members of the Phantom Troupe, a group who Kurapika is seeking revenge on. Machi Komacine is also a member of the same troupe, who is said to be one of the most stoic and cold-hearted members of the group.

Currently Confirmed Characters for Hunter X Hunter: Nen X Impact

  • Gon Freecs
  • Killua Zoldyck
  • Kurapika
  • Leorio Paradinight
  • Hisoka Morow
  • Isaac Netero
  • Uvogin
  • Machi Komacine

The trailer also showed off some of the moves for the first six confirmed characters of Nen X Impact , showing how each character plays. The trailer also confirmed the platforms that Nen X Impact will release on, which include PS5, PC via Steam, and Nintendo Switch. Players in attendance at the EVO Japan 2024 fighting game tournament this weekend can also play the game for themselves.

item.title: Stellar Blade Settings Change Could Make the Game Better
item.description:
Highlights

  • A fan suggests using Stellar Blade's Korean dub for more emotional voice acting.
  • The English dub in Stellar Blade has been criticized for lacking emotion.
  • Players can switch to the Korean dub with English subtitles for a potentially better experience.

A Stellar Blade fan has discovered one settings change that could potentially improve the game for a lot of players. The recent release of Stellar Blade on PlayStation 5 has attracted a ton of hype, but there's one element that has left some fans underwhelmed, although this can be solved with a single change in the settings.

Upon its release, Stellar Blade has been met with high critical praise . While a lot of the attention drawn to the game pre-release was centered on the appearance of its protagonist, there's no doubt that Stellar Blade has also proven it has a lot to offer in the gameplay department. It takes strong inspiration from Soulslikes, with a lower difficulty ceiling to remove some of the frustration commonly associated with the genre. While it joins the club of stellar PlayStation 5 exclusives, it isn't perfect, but one of its biggest problems could be solved in the settings menu.

Related
Stellar Blade: Every Trophy (& How to Unlock Them)
This Stellar Blade trophy guide will give you all the details to add that Platinum trophy to your collection.

A post on the Stellar Blade subreddit by user TomatilloExtreme underlined some issues with the game's English dub, describing it as "godawful," and pointing out that it had been highlighted by several critics for lacking emotion throughout the game. Their suggestion to solve this is simple - use the Korean dub of the game with English subtitles. According to TomatilloExtreme, this results in the actors showing "a bigger range of emotion," although this will naturally prove subjective for every player. Some in the thread pointed out that Stellar Blade 's Eve has a strong English voice actor, with most agreeing it's the rest of the cast that leaves a little to be desired.

Some Gamers Are Using Stellar Blade's Korean Dub

Gamers choosing to play with foreign-language dubs isn't totally uncommon. Sometimes, the English voiceover just doesn't fit the setting. A common example of this in the past was Assassin's Creed Unity . Set in Paris, the game used strong English accents throughout, and many players instead moved over to the French dub for a more authentic experience. Changing over to the Korean dub probably won't make beating Stellar Blade a more authentic experience in the same regard, but if it could enhance the emotion for some players, it could be worth trying.

With Stellar Blade proving to be an early success, it will be interesting to see how much post-launch support the game receives from developer Shift Up. Stellar Blade added New Game+ on launch day , which is certainly a strong start, but the game has so much potential for more DLC in the future. With such a great base game to work from, hopefully Shift Up delivers going forward.

item.title: Ambitious Stardew Valley Mod Will Marry the Game With Baldur's Gate 3
item.description:
Highlights

  • A newly announced Stardew Valley mod seeks to extend the game with a bunch of Baldur's Gate 3-inspired content.
  • Called Baldur's Village, the mod promises to add a new hamlet location and multiple BG3 characters to the evergreen farming sim.
  • Astarion is also planned to have a "unique romance plot" in Baldur's Village.

A newly announced Stardew Valley mod seeks to introduce a variety of Baldur's Gate 3 -inspired content to the game. The ambitious project could hence add to the ever-growing list of community-created Stardew Valley add-ons, assuming it manages to realize its avid aspirations.

The hit farming sim developed by Eric "ConcernedApe" Barone has long enjoyed a lot of attention from the modding community. That's in part because Barone is a big proponent of modding, who has actively encouraged community content by consistently making Stardew Valley more modder-friendly since its initial release. Combined with the game's overall popularity, those efforts helped shape a vibrant modding scene that produced many amazing Stardew Valley mods over the years.

Related
8 Most Downloaded Mods For Stardew Valley
Stardew Valley possesses a lively modding scene where players can find almost anything they need. These mods see the most traffic.

Baldur's Village Mod Bringing Baldur's Gate Characters and New Map to Stardew Valley

Another head-turning project has now emerged from that very same community in the form of Baldur's Village. Like its name implies, the mod seeks to extend Stardew Valley with the addition of an entirely new hamlet location inspired by Larian's critically acclaimed RPG. Several Baldur's Gate 3 characters are also planned to be part of the package, with its cast being confirmed to include Astarion, Shadowheart, Halsin, and Gale.

Much like the RPG that inspired it, Baldur's Village will allow Stardew Valley players to romance Astarion . The current plan is to treat Astarion to a "unique romance plot," with one of the mod's developers saying as much in a recent tweet. The team is also considering the idea of making more characters dateable but hasn't yet committed to it, as per the same source. So far, the developers have managed to complete the art of the mod's map, in addition to modeling four new building styles. Astarion, Gale, and Shadowheart's artwork has also been completed.

The full scope of the Baldur's Village character roster remains unclear. The project itself is currently being developed by only three people, so it might take a while to see the light of day. Community efforts of this sort do have a tendency to fizzle out the more ambitious they are, although Baldur's Village developers do seem committed to seeing their plans through for the time being. The team is also currently on the lookout for translators, specifically those fluent in Chinese, who would be able to help them localize their writing "vividly."

Baldur's Village is confirmed to incorporate some custom furniture assets by prolific Nexus Mods user HimeTarts. Should the developers manage to complete it, this Baldur's Gate 3 -inspired project would add to the already substantial list of impressive expansion mods for Stardew Valley .
